bio.summary: There are at least ten artists with this name: 1) A Swedish rock band, from småland, växjö 2) An alternative rock band formed in Burlingame California 3) An all girl Japanese hard rock/heavy metal band 4) A black/death metal band formed in Québec 5) A french artist producing hard/dark electronic tunes 6) A taiwanese post-rock band 7) An alternative rock band formed in London, Ontario 8) A hardcore punk/crust band from Pittsburgh,Pennsylvannia Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: There are at least ten artists with this name: 1) A Swedish rock band, from småland, växjö 2) An alternative rock band formed in Burlingame California 3) An all girl Japanese hard rock/heavy metal band 4) A black/death metal band formed in Québec 5) A french artist producing hard/dark electronic tunes 6) A taiwanese post-rock band 7) An alternative rock band formed in London, Ontario 8) A hardcore punk/crust band from Pittsburgh,Pennsylvannia 9) An experimental noise artist from Scotland. 10) An industrial group from Vancouver, British Columbia 11) An experimental project created by Abeille Hellion 1) A Swedish rock band, from småland, växjö (villages around växjö). Originally they where called Image but when they changed their singer they became known as aphasia 2) An alternative rock band formed in Burlingame California, US in the late 1990s. 3) An all girl Japanese hard rock/heavy metal band formed in 1994. 4) A black/death metal band formed in Québec, Canada in 1995. 5) A French artist producing hard/dark electronic tunes. 6) A Taiwanese rock group consisting members from the now disbanded 妮波寺. Aphasia's Taiwanese name for this band is known as 阿飛西雅. 7) An alternative rock band formed in London, Ontario. In 2005 they changed their name to "LYe". 8) A hardcore punk/crust band from Pittsburgh,Pennsylvannia,US,that released one self-titled 7" and later became Die Screaming,which is also now defunct.Members of this band play in: Icon Gallery, Suburban Death Machine and F.L.A.K. 9) An one man experimental noise artist from Scotland, Richard Johnson. Did a colaboration with Brume called 'Brume vs Aphasia. 10) An one man industrial musician from Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, that started producing music in the later 1990's. 11) A less constructed project by Abeille Hellion focusing on music heard while sleeping. Began in 2012. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
